BIO

Hi, I'm Ben!

I am a hardworking individual who thrives to seek more knowledge when it comes to front end web development. I spend most of my free time practicing all kinds of frameworks and libraries to bolster my knowledge and skills to improve myself and my work.

I am aspiring to having a career at the forefront of creative tech innovation.

PROJECTS

War Within Task-List

HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript | SCSS

Download Github

The war within task list was a personal project that I wanted to create for my own personal use for a game that I play. The purpose of it was to use CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) to form a task list with categories, sub categories and tasks. This would make it so I can input tasks that would need doing on the game. I could check each task off one by one and a counter would illustrate how many of the tasks have been completed. The site would use local storage to remember the tasks that I have added. I decided to use SCSS to create this site for the sole purpose of learning a new style sheet.

Rover
(Group project)

HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript

Download Github

The Perseverance Rover was a group project in University. It not only uses HTML, CSS and JavaScript but also animations and embedded videos. On top of all this, it also won an award for "Best Design" at my University. It was my first experience of working as a group on a project, which in the end I found interesting and fun.

Better Days Play Therapy

HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript

Download Github

Better Days Play Therapy was a website I designed and developed for one of my Mothers' friends. We spoke on teams in regards to the designs they wanted as well as any features they wanted implemented. I gave my opinion on the design elements at times but in the end, it was mostly following their guidelines. This was my first time working for someone else.

Contemporary Coatings

HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript

Download Github

Contemporary Coatings is a redesign of my brother-in-law's website for his business. I wanted to see if I was able to recreate his website which was made by a professional web developer. It pushed my limits to see if I am able to reproduce a professional website. The gallery was the challenging part, but I found it interesting. I also added and changed a few extra elements of the website to see if I could make an improvement. You can view his site here

Love Maths

HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript

Download Github

Love Maths is a JavaScript orientated website that allows the user to challenge their math skills. This site was created by following a walk-through which had challenges for me to solve. In the end, It works perfectly.

Love Running

HTML5 | CSS3 | JavaScript

Download Github

Love Running is another walkthrough project that I wanted to follow through with to learn new skills that I may not have already known. By following a walkthrough project, it allowed me to gain the perspective of another web developer to see the differences in our programming skills.
